name: Cat Bubble Shooter
description:
Help the cat to shoot all the bubbles in this cat and forest themed bubble shooter game. Cat bubble shooter is extreme hard to play, the new rows of bubbles will fall down every 20 seconds. It sure is a race against the clock to clear the new lines of bubbles before they drop down. Help the cat to clear the levels to win this game.

Aim the bubbles and shoot with your mouse.

Our website: Bubble Shooter
